Text:
Great; another favourite of mine. Keep the classics coming. You are one that not forgets them in your choice of uploads. Thanks again for the comancheros. Looked and played great.
If you have the time please consider doing a man called horse, big jake and Rio Lobo some time.

 Especially a man called horse is a beauty and well done on bluRay. Thanks again for your uploads they are appreciated.
You will have to wait for them...None of them have been properly ripped yet.
Hi DownTYU, thanks for your responce. I will look out for them then. No hurry; the ones you are putting on P.B. every day are great . Thanks for your effort. It is appreciated.
